Description:
Duties & responsibilities but not limited to:Monitor the level of stock in store/warehouse locations and consumption in each outlet and central kitchen on an ongoing basis.
Generate consumption reports to monitor the inventory stock level and compare them with the inventory transfer requisition made by the outlets.
Review physical inventory adjustments by the store locations and investigate any abnormalities.
Monitor the weekly inventory closing in the system in relation to the consumption, item movement, and requisitions calculated in the system.
Monitor the purchasing price of raw materials from the suppliers and report any increase in the prices rather than the contracted/agreed prices.
Oversee closure of PO across the company
Oversee closure of transfer requests across the company
Ensure goods in transit do not exist at the closing period.
Set inventory levels for food and beverage products.
Track inventory levels of food and beverage products.
Reconcile inventory records to ensure accuracy.
Manage inventory costs.
Report on inventory levels to management.
Ensure compliance with food safety regulations.
Develop and implement inventory management policies and procedures.
Conduct inventory audits.Skills
